properties.areaDesc: Pope, IL; Hardin, IL; Crittenden, KY; Livingston, KY
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 7:26PM CST until February 25 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following river in Indiana...
Kentucky...Illinois...

Ohio River at Owensboro...Newburgh Dam...Evansville...Mount Vernon
...J.T. Myers Dam...Shawneetown and Golconda

.Locations along the Ohio River from Owensboro to Golcanda have either
crested or will crest on Thursday. The listed locations will see water
levels slowly fall, gradually falling below flood stage between Friday
and next Tuesday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Golconda
* until Tuesday afternoon.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 46.9 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 47.1 feet by
Thursday afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage Tuesday
morning.
* Impact...At 46.0 Feet...Flooding begins to affect Rosiclare
Illinois.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
